parameters.name: max_depth
parameters.description: Maximum depth of the tree. Controls overfitting by limiting how deep the tree can grow.

parameters.name: criterion
parameters.description: Function to measure the quality of a split. Gini impurity or information entropy.

parameters.name: min_samples_split
parameters.description: Minimum number of samples required to split an internal node.

parameters.name: min_samples_leaf
parameters.description: Minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node.

parameters.name: max_features
parameters.description: Number of features to consider when looking for the best split. null uses all features.
